page.title: 15HOBBIES AND PASTIMES(1)
page.content: {Rachael:}What takes up my spare time is swimming.3 years ago I joined Etwall Eagles Swimming Club.That was where I started to swim in lots of galas and open meets.Now I swim for City of Derby Club.I have to go training every day except Fridays.I have won many medals and I save all the newspaper cuttings in a large scrap book. {Lucy:}Most nights and weekends I spend my time practicing my music.I play the piano,flute and the guitar.I also play the recorder.I do at least half an hour on all my musical instruments.My piano teacher lives in Hilton but for my flute I have to go to Rolleston, which is four miles away.Sometimes we have to cycle.I do my guitar and recorder lessons at school.
